properties.entry: UPDATE "USER" SET STATUS = 'B', MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) as COUNT FROM BLACKLIST

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT USER_NO ,USER_ID ,REASON ,BLACK_DATE ,STATUS , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY USER_NO DESC) as RNUM FROM BLACKLIST JOIN "USER" USING(USER_NO) ORDER BY USER_NO DESC ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT USER_NO ,USER_ID ,REASON ,BLACK_DATE ,STATUS FROM BLACKLIST JOIN "USER" USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = 11
UPDATE "USER" SET STATUS = 'U', MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_NO = 11
